thread.title: Emmerdale star Ryan Hawley on rewind episode surprises: 'The secrets revealed will be unexpected' - Emmerdale Soaps -
thread.title_full: Emmerdale star Ryan Hawley on rewind episode surprises: 'The secrets revealed will be unexpected' - Emmerdale News - Soaps - Digital Spy

author: Sophie Dainty
title: Emmerdale star Ryan Hawley on rewind episode surprises: 'The secrets revealed will be unexpected' - Emmerdale Soaps -
text: Emmerdale star Ryan Hawley has hinted that some of the secrets revealed in tonight's big episode will be surprising.The ITV soap is airing a special hour-long 'rewind' episode to resolve the 'Who Shot Robert Sugden?' mystery. © ITV / Rex Features / Steve MeddleRyan Hawley The instalment will take viewers back to the night that Hawley's character Robert was shot four weeks ago, but two other secrets are set to be revealed too.Speaking on Lorraine today (October 22), Hawley said: "They are going to show everything that was withheld from the audience on the night of the shooting."There are other stories starting with other characters who you wouldn't expect and their whereabouts [are] going to be revealed tonight as well. The episode is fantastic." © ITVEmmerdale promo picture for rewind episode Discussing the reaction he has received since joining the show, Hawley admitted that people are cautious of him because he plays such a villainous character.He said: "People expect me to be horrible and they are cautious of me. Often in the aisle of the supermarket I will get approached."Emmerdale airs a regular episode tonight at 7pm on ITV, followed by the hour-long rewind at 8pm.Digital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on EastEnders' Halloween special, Nikhil's Emmerdale return, the Nightingale family's arrival in Hollyoaks and a new romance story for Mary in Coronation Street. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4565610458001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14565610458001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4565610458001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4565610458001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14565610458001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4565610458001.init(); ai_type="video"; } Get the Inside Soap magazine on your iPhone or iPad
